data.text:
Learn about five cities that transformed adversity into opportunities for growth. Read our latest blog and witness how these towns, once marred by natural disasters, rose from the ruins to craft remarkable stories of rebirth. From earthquakes to floods, its inhabitants were capable of turning darkest hours into chapters of renewal, showcasing the spirit of human determination and the power of collective action in the face of calamity. To read more: https://dk.world/3ubvBqJ

It seems that ‚Äîin the aftermath of a disaster‚Äî macaques are doing what #Europeans did after the #disaster of the II WW: they join forces and show tolerance and understanding. Situation: summing - #climatechange, - the idiocy of #MEGA and it's possible allies (the #French #Stylo and the #italian #Poisonous #Melon and others power-thirsty vampires), - the madness of the #ZarOfTheWars, - the coming back of the #BananaRepublic in #Argentina and its possible influence on brainless Europeans, the only way to avoid #climate, #economic and #social #disasters is seriously going back to the frame of mind of the old Founding Fathers of the European Union: #unity. Macaques joined forces in the aftermath of a #Climate #Disaster. An example to follow, European Commission and Ursula von der Leyen. But not #after the disaster. If we really are more intelligent than macaques, we should do it #before. Life is not a rehearsal. We only have one opportunity. And wasting it in #power #games can be defined by only one binomial coupling: #greedy #stupidity.

Recently, natural disasters have had consequences that reach far beyond physical and humanitarian impact. Instead, they have come into the political sphere, altering the dynamics between nations, leaders, and their populations. This has prompted a shift in our current political landscape, resulting in what is now termed the "politicisation of natural disasters. Read the full article on the website: https://shorturl.at/dIMOV #AlHabtoorResearchCentre #EarthquakeDiplomacy #Turkey
